Package propra22.q8493367.point

Class Point

java.lang.Object
propra22.q8493367.point.Point
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<IPoint>, IPoint
public class Point extends Object implements IPoint
The Class Point represents a point in a cartesian coordinate system.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(IPoint p)
      Compare to is used to implement the used order relation to compare two points. This means, if the returned int is smaller than zero then this < point. If the returned int is equal to zero then this == point. If the returned int is bigger than zero then this > point.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<IPoint>
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface IPoint
      Parameters:
      p - the point which is compared with the point represented by this.
      Returns:
      the result of the comparison as described above.

    • signedTriangleArea

      public static long signedTriangleArea(IPoint a, IPoint b, IPoint c)
      Returns the signed area multiplied by 2 of the triangle created by the three points a, b and c. If, in a cartesian coordinate system, c is on the left side of the line going through a and b the sign is negative. If c is on the right side of the line going throug a and b, the sign is positive. If c is on the line going through a and b, the result is 0.
      Parameters:
      a - the point a
      b - the point b
      c - the point c
      Returns:
      the signed area of the triangle

    • qaudraticDistance

      public static long qaudraticDistance(IPoint a, IPoint b)
      Returns the square of the euclidean distance between the two points a and b.
      Parameters:
      a - the point a
      b - the point b
      Returns:
      the square of the euclidean distance

    • isShorter

      public static boolean isShorter(IPoint a, IPoint b, IPoint c, IPoint d)
      Returns true, if the square of the euclidean distance between the points a and b is shorter than the euclidean distance between the point c and d.
      Parameters:
      a - the point a
      b - the point b
      c - the point c
      d - the point d
      Returns:
      true, if the square of the euclidean distance between the points a and b is shorter than the euclidean distance between the point c and d. Returns false otherwise.

    • isLonger

      public static boolean isLonger(IPoint a, IPoint b, IPoint c, IPoint d)

      Parameters:

      b - the point b

      d - the point d

    • isHigher

      public static boolean isHigher(IPoint a, IPoint c, IPoint d1, IPoint d2)
      Compares the two triangles a - c - d1 and a - c - d2. Returns true, if the first triangle is higher over the base a - c than the second triangle. Returns false otherwise
      Parameters:
      a - the point a
      c - the the point c
      d1 - the point d1
      d2 - the point d2
      Returns:
      true, if the triangle a - c - d1 is higher over the base a - c than the triangle a - c - d2
